Tracer.name: Blink
Tracer.description: Dash towards an area. Stores 3 charges.

Tracer.name: Melee
Tracer.description: Deal 254 (+4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using Melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

Tracer.name: Recall
Tracer.description: Return to the position you were at 3 seconds ago, refill your ammo, and remove all negative status effects from yourself.

Tracer.name: Pulse Bomb
Tracer.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to enemy units if you hit them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 420 (+5.5% per level) damage to them and 210 (+5.5% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.  This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

Tracer.name: Reload
Tracer.description: You can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times you need to reload over 0.75 seconds. You can manually reload early by activating Reload.

1.name: Pulse Strike
1.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

1.name: Slipstream
1.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

1.name: Tracer Rounds
1.description: Your Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
4.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

4.name: Parting Gift
4.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

4.name: Untouchable
4.description: Quest: Takedowns increase your Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

7.name: Bullet Time
7.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

7.name: Spatial Echo
7.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 10% of the primary target's maximum Health.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Bullet Spray
13.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

13.name: Leeching Rounds
13.description: Your Basic Attacks against Heroes heal you for 20% of their damage dealt.

13.name: Ricochet
13.description: Your Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

16.name: Focus Fire
16.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94.5 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

16.name: Locked and Loaded
16.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase your Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

16.name: Sleight of Hand
16.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: If you successfully stick a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero, you also drop another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away from you.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals you equal to the amount of Health you lost during that time.
